channel.title: ItemDB
channel.description: Im wanting to make a item database site and i was wondering how i would get one on my site.

item.title: ItemDB
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

I’m going to guess, RS items.
http://www.php-mysql-tutorial.com/wikis/mysql-tutorials/getting-started-with-mysql.aspx

Read full topic

item.title: ItemDB
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz, post:4, topic:395327”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=492514.msg3601411#msg3601411 date=1305601031]

it’s impossible. it requires skills that have yet to be developed on this planet.

i’m sorry i had to announce such devastating news to you…

Or at least the skills are lacked by most members here.

@OP - There is one bit of information you are missing. What type of item database? Runescape, Eudemons, Conquer, there are too many games out to say “item database”.
[/quote]
Sorry for the sarcasm but this is a runescape private server site so it would be runescape yes there may be somethings that people post in this general discussion or general programming but it is basically runescape related.[/quote]
This is also the general programming section that isn’t for runescape or RSPS discussion? So it was safe for me to assume you were talking about RSPS, but I cannot be 100% because of the subjects that are supposed to be kept out. Get it now? Anyways, the concept would be (for this), what kind of data would the database be containing? The name and ID, or stats as well?

Read full topic
